column5: In case any of you are in the same boat I am, with soft water almost over and a few reels needing service.  I thought I'd call before I used the address on the warrantee cards in the boxes... before sending my 22 yr old Mag II and a used only twice Pen 209 in for repairs.  Rocky's Tackle 10 Brammer Drive Orillia, Ontario L3V 7T4 705-325-3526
Just a little extra Wayne.  Toll Free Number  1-877-328-8501

If it's the same guy a friend of mine went to, he did good work on his old Mitchell.  I'm hoping to take  a couple of mine in over the winter for a good cleaning and tune up.  I figure if I try to do it myself, I'll wreck the things  Maureen
I've dealt with Rocky's before and they provide excellent service.  Another good place for reel service, for those  that don't already know about them in the GTA  Aikmens in Mississauga  905-277-3595
I'll second Lew's recomendation for the GTA guys Aikmens does fine work at a reasonable rate.  Cheers, 1leg
